item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:31, topic:521265”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=639778.msg4312405#msg4312405 date=1370956586]

Ahhh! They announced Kingdom Hearts 3 and I missed it!!! generic expletive ing brother kicking me off the god damn computer for his generic expletive ing friends… Dammit…

You didn’t miss much. It was basically a trailer that showed off very little other than Sora, a keyblade, and some form of a beach It was slapped on to the end of the FFXV announcement
[/quote]ahh. Ok. I did see the trailer. I’ll have to find a video for ff15. Does anyone know if ps4 will play ps3?[/quote]
I don’t think the discs are directly backwards compatible, but I’m sure they’ll make them available for digital download in the future.

item.title: How to play moparscape google search
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:17, topic:521265”][quote author=casey. link=topic=639778.msg4312259#msg4312259 date=1370919916]
Great presentation by Sony. In terms of Xbox One vs PS4, PS4 killed it.

Nintendo is up tomorrow. But for now, Sony wins e3.
[/quote]
You need to add to OP that you have to be a PS+ member for online play now. Not a big deal since Xbox has been doing it for years, but it is a new change to the ecosystem.[/quote]

You misunderstood (or maybe I misunderstood, hopefully someone can confirm with written sources instead of video).

PSN = online with standard content (multiplayer, some features might be locked but shouldn’t hinder gameplay)
PSN+ = online with bonus content (possible access to DLC early, bonus features unlocked)

That’s how I see it. $5 for bonus features per month and cloud saving (more space on the already big hard drive) isn’t too bad imo.

If it is $5 to play online, that’s a good price considering the features it gives anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: How to play moparscape google search
